rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0001
rows.name:
So, Commander, to what do we owe the pleasure
of your visit here today?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Well, I can't just ask Nagi to do everything for me—
I'd be out of a job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0003
rows.name: Hey, I delivered you the new recruit, didn't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Yeah, yeah. You won the bet. Don't worry about it, all right?
I'll settle up with you later—you know I'm good for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0005
rows.name: The "bet"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0006
rows.name:
I'm sure I'm needed elsewhere.
If you'll all excuse me. Commander.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0007
rows.name: Well, that wasn't obvious at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Heh. Look at you two.
I swear, you're like two children excited about a new toy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Look who's talking. I don't recall ever seeing you
file a request to personally train a rescue before?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0010
rows.name: Is that so odd?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0011_m
rows.name:
It is before we'd even asked him to become a BLADE,
Little Miss Stick-in-the-rear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0011_f
rows.name:
It is before we'd even asked her to become a BLADE,
Little Miss Stick-in-the-rear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Usually, I ask when I don't get your slang expressions,
but something tells me to just let that one go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0013
rows.name:
Enough about that. Where are your manners, anyway?
I still haven't been introduced to our new recruit here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0014
rows.name: Commander Vandham is BLADE's top officer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0015
rows.name: In a past life, I was Chief Engineer on the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Same idea, basically—someone has a problem, I fix it.
You follow?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0017
rows.name: ...Not much for conversation, are ya?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0018
rows.name:
So you still haven't told us why you're here.
From the look of things, I'm guessing this isn't a social call.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0019
rows.name: You don't think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0020
rows.name: No, so let's cut the crap and get down to business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0021
rows.name:
Hah! Sounds like you're learning
my expressions just fine, Elma.[ST:page p1=90 ]Anyway, first we need Chatty Cathy here
to choose a division and pull an assignment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_JNK0010
rows.name: Get Started

rows.label: xs03010100_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask about the assignment.

rows.label: xs03010100_JNK0020
rows.name: Get More Info

rows.label: xs03010100_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask about divisions.

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0022
rows.name: Whoa there, itchy-trigger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0023
rows.name:
I know you're just chaffin' at the bit to run out there and grab
the world by its tail, but you need to choose a division first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0024
rows.name:
Once that's all hashed out, we can get into detail
about what your first assignment's gonna be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Pretty much everyone in New LA works for BLADE,
in one of several different fields.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0026
rows.name:
Helping to explore Mira, or to maintain order in the city,
or—well you remember Nagi's speech, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0027
rows.name:
There are eight different fields in all,
and each one has its own branch within BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0028
rows.name: Officially, they're called "divisions."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Naturally, you'll want to choose one
that best suits your personality and your talents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0030
rows.name: Let's start with the Pathfinders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0031
rows.name: Pathfinders' number one responsibility...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0032
rows.name:
is planting data probes—
like you did on your training mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0033
rows.name:
It may not be the sexiest job, but important?
You bet your ass it's important.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0034
rows.name:
We've only been on Mira two months—
we don't know jack about this place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0035
rows.name:
The more probes we install, the faster we can
get our bearings here and give ourselves a fighting chance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0036
rows.name:
We've already detailed how important it is
we expand the FrontierNav network ASAP.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0037
rows.name: So for the time being, I'll just remind you of the highlights:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0038
rows.name: It helps us keep BLADEs safe, it helps us keep the city safe,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0039
rows.name:
and most important of all, it's the key to locating the missing
parts of the Lifehold and recovering the rest of the human race.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0040
rows.name: Okay, next up—Interceptors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0041
rows.name:
You met Akulov and Evans, right? Irina and Gwin?
This is their division.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0042
rows.name: Interceptors have one main duty:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0043
rows.name:
protect New LA and everyone in it
from the wildlife here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0044
rows.name: Right now, this is probably our busiest division.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0045
rows.name: Interceptors ride shotgun for the research eggheads,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0046
rows.name:
they escort VIPs around, and they help any other idiots
who get caught out there with their pants down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0047
rows.name: Next are the Harriers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0048
rows.name:
Remember Doug Barrett?
The Skell pilot conducting the test flight with Lin?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0049
rows.name: He's part of the Harriers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0050
rows.name:
If you think of the Interceptors as defense,
Harriers would be New LA's offense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0051
rows.name:
They specialize in pre-emptive strikes
on clear and obvious threats.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0052
rows.name:
But ONLY on clear and obvious threats—they're not meant
to go out and just blast any indigen that moves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0053
rows.name: Then you got your Reclaimers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0054
rows.name:
These guys are in charge of finding
the other pieces of the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0055
rows.name:
Among other things, that is...
including anything of ours left behind after a battle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0056
rows.name:
Skell debris, weapons, personal effects...
It can get a bit morbid, frankly, but it's got to be done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0057
rows.name:
Until we're up and running here on Mira
and have this place completely figured out,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0058
rows.name:
everything we brought from Earth needs to be
treated like it's irreplaceable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0059
rows.name:
Also, the search for the Lifehold—
that's mostly on the Reclaimers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0060
rows.name: Next: Curators.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0061
rows.name: Curators are the first to scout ahead to unexplored territory,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0062
rows.name:
bringing back whatever samples they can get their hands on:
fruits, bugs, sticks and stones—you name it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0063
rows.name:
It's not all picking berries, though—being a Curator
also means being the first to encounter unknown indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0064
rows.name: Next...ah, right, Prospectors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0065
rows.name:
Prospectors do...well, prospectin'.[ST:page p1=100 ]They poke around, looking for minerals, resources
and what not—things we need for everyday life here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0066
rows.name:
We packed all the essentials we could on the White Whale,
but that won't last forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0067
rows.name:
We need to be able to replenish our water and fuel
if we want to survive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0068
rows.name:
And sooner or later, we're gonna have to figure out
how to replace things from scratch—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0069
rows.name:
from the socket on a Skell's knee joint,
right down to the frying pan in Lin's kitchen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0070
rows.name:
Without these guys bustin' their butts,
we'd have no future to speak of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0071
rows.name: Next up: Outfitters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0072
rows.name:
All of our ground gear and Skell weaponry is developed
in conjunction with private arms manufacturers, or AMs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0073
rows.name: Outfitters are BLADE's way of supporting these AMs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0074
rows.name: They'll seek out anything that might inspire new weapon ideas,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0075
rows.name: and even assist with testing new prototypes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0076
rows.name: Finally, the Mediators.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0077
rows.name:
These are the folks who keep everything hunky-dory
with Jon and Joan Q. Public.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0078
rows.name:
Any problems a civvy has, they come to Mediators.
Fight with your neighbor? Mediators. Lost cat? Mediators.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0079
rows.name:
It's not a division for everyone.
You need to be a jack of all trades, and a people person.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0080
rows.name:
Someone with my charming personality?
Probably not the best Mediator.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0081
rows.name:
But if you got what it takes, it's a clutch role,
keeping things cool on the home front.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0082
rows.name: All right, so, I think that's all eight divisions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0083
rows.name: Any idea which one you'd like to join?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0084
rows.name:
Don't fret about it too much—whichever you choose,
you still have a lot of freedom in how you operate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0085
rows.name:
Mediators can still get out there and mix it up,
hunt indigens, whatever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0086
rows.name:
And if a Harrier wants to take a break
and settle an argument, that's their prerogative, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0087
rows.name:
To be honest? Even though it's sort of frowned upon,
you can actually change your division whenever you like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0088
rows.name:
So there's really no reason to stress about this.
All right, you ready to choose?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_JNK0030
rows.name: Decide

rows.label: xs03010100_SEL0031
rows.name: Say you're ready to choose a division.

rows.label: xs03010100_JNK0040
rows.name: Hesitate

rows.label: xs03010100_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask to explain the divisions again.

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0089
rows.name:
Oh, for the love of—
FINE, once more from the top:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0090
rows.name: Yeah, and...? We're on pins and needles here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: xs03010100_SEL0051
rows.name: Select your division.

rows.label: xs03010100_JNK0060
rows.name: Hesitate

rows.label: xs03010100_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask to explain the divisions again.

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0091
rows.name: Then it's settled?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_JNK0070
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: xs03010100_SEL0071
rows.name: Tell Elma it's settled.

rows.label: xs03010100_JNK0080
rows.name: Reconsider

rows.label: xs03010100_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask to choose a different division.

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0092
rows.name: All right! Thank God that's over...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0092_2
rows.name:
By the power invested in me, yadda yadda:
You're officially a BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0093
rows.name: Congrats, and welcome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0094
rows.name: I know you're gonna do great.[ST:wait ]
